DOC.brief_summary: With advent manage care , increase responsibility care patient diabetes placed primary care physician . Evidence exists physicians meeting establish practice guideline , outcomes patient diabetes less optimal . It thus objective study institute community-based diabetes education intervention physicians patient enhance adherence guideline improve patient outcomes . We conduct chart review ( submit separate IRB : # 000733 ) primary care practice determine health status guideline adherence . Following chart review , physician practice assign one three group : physician + patient education , physician education alone , usual care . Following intervention , repeat chart review conduct . Pre posttest comparison conduct examine change primarily glycemic control , quality life , patient knowledge , physician adherence practice guideline . Secondarily , examine change therapeutic intervention , body mass index , barrier diabetes care . We also examine individual barrier diabetes care influence outcome population . The last phase study encompass second follow-up visit examine behavioral factor related clinical change sustainability intervention .
